text: Lelio Lagorio (9 November 1925 - 7 January 2017) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Socialist Party (Partito Socialista Italiano, PSI). He served as the first President of Tuscany from 1970 until 1978. Before that, he was mayor of Florence from 1964 to 1965. He was born in Trieste. Lagorio died on 7 January 2017 in Florence. He was 91. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian Socialist Party politicians Category:Politicians from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:People from Trieste
title: Lelio Lagorio
